name: LOG_CLAVIEN_SCORE
description: This table contains Surgical Log (ORL) items related to Clavien Scores for procedural complications.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLAVIEN_SCORE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the documented Clavien score that defines complication severity for a procedure on a log.

columns.name: CLAVIEN_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item contains each procedure on a log requiring a Clavien score that has been documented.

columns.name: CLAVIEN_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.
